text: Am I suicidal and just don t know it  The past couple months  I have been experiencing very constant thoughts about dying  Not active suicidal thoughts   It s not a  wanting  feeling  but more of a strong curiosity mind wandering collection of thoughts      These thoughts feel like intrusive thoughts  except instead of them coming every so often  I find myself thinking them at least a couple times a day       Things like        picturing myself getting hit by cars buses while I walk down the street      the process to the hospital if i were to get hurt      how I think my friends family work colleagues would feel  and how they would move forward      the food that would go bad in my fridge      future events that I would miss if something were to happen      how many pairs of shoes would be left in my closet      what it would feel like to pass away while I m sleeping  and if it would really just feel like I m sleeping      food I would miss most if I couldn t eat anymore  music I would miss  movies  things I haven t done yet etc      The list goes on   but they seem to be little mundane thoughts like these     The thoughts don t make me feel sad or depressed   I have gone through depression before a couple years ago  and was on medication for a little while  so I feel like I know fairly well what depression feels like  and these thoughts don t seem to be like that       The past couple months of my life have been very up and down emotionally  so that could definitely be a contributing factor   I know that I already have personal issues with low self esteem and having a lack of confidence  I have many aspirations and passions that I want to pursue  but often times feel overwhelmed by them  and feel unproductive in working towards them       These thoughts do not feel particularly negative or upsetting  I ve just never had such a long period of time go by with such constant thoughts like these      I m reaching out here to see if anybody else may have felt this way before too  or if anybody has any insight into this type of thinking      Thanks
summary: For the past couple of months, I have been having constant thoughts about dying. I have gone through depression before and was on medication for a while. The past couple months of my life have been up and down emotionally. I already have issues with low self esteem and a lack of confidence.

text: Accept itThis is the best it will ever be Life is what you make it There is no perpetual state of joy  It s always up and down with periods of  normalcy  in between I m an addict and everything that ever made me feel good once  has never made me feel that same way again   When you think about life on this planet and how many so many other creatures live purely for survival while humans have learned to live for comfort  What if nothing brings you comfort because it s never enough  The thought of how many other people are alive and what little of an impact you make on those around you and the community you live in   I m a speck  A miserable speck  I don t know how to just float on like others do  I can t make life meaningful because it s not supposed to be this long   I do not want to spend the rest of my life having to live what others have done a billion times over   I don t know but a handful who would mourn me  There is nothing keeping me attached here  You have to live life for yourself and find happiness within yourself but what if there is nothing there  I cannot create what does not already exist  I m not smart enough for that   Disappearing or distracting yourself seems a temporary fix at best because real life comes creeping back in   What would make me happiest is not having to exist anymore  I would like a way out  Get me off this ride  I can t make it work  I can t change the outcome   October is it for me
summary: There is no perpetual state of joy in life. Everything that made me feel good once has never made him feel the same way again. Life is not supposed to be this long and humans live for comfort. October is it for me.
cleaned: no perpetual state joy life feel good feel way life not suppose long human live comfort october

text: I m Scared of My Future I matured very quickly as a young kid  I ve always been bullied  ever since preschool  for three main reasons  I m physically weak   I m slow  chubby  have poor hand eye coordination  I m socially awkward   Having Asperger s Syndrome  I try to bond with others  yet  with few exceptions  fail miserably  I m nerdy   I have an interest in world history  philosophy  physics  astronomy  and mathematics  which doesn t help me in school trying to bond with others And that s why I ve matured so quickly  As a little kid  I vowed to be like an adult   I didn t want to be like my classmates  So I vowed to become an adult in a little kid s body  Even before that  I ve always been in a rush to grow up  When I was a toddler  only a few weeks after I started speaking  I threw out my binky voluntarily  with no prodding from my parents  When I was in kindergarten  I wouldn t talk to other boys and always talk to the teacher during recess In addition  my family  with the exception of my father  has ruthlessly treated me like garbage  Every day my older brother beats me until I m bruised and my mother has molested me  Also  ever since I was in first grade I ve envied girls  I wanted to wear dresses and makeup  to have long hair  and be sweet and convivial  But I knew I d be bullied  and so to this day  I suppress it Now I worry I ll never grow up properly  When I m home alone  I spend my time watching cartoons and playing with toys from when I was younger  I m worried that when I do get a job and move out  I ll become a manchild  I m worried that I ll become an emotionally disturbed weirdo playing Pokemon and Scribblenauts into adulthood  watching Adventure Time and Gravity Falls instead of shows for adults  Like I ll be cuddling a large teddy bear watching We Bare Bears in   years Fuck  man
summary: As a kid, I was bullied for being physically weak, slow chubby, socially awkward, having Asperger's Syndrome and nerdy. Now as an adult, I worry I won't grow up properly and I might become an emotionally disturbed weirdo.
